According to Montenegrin news borders will open between 1 and 10 of June but only to citizens of neighboring countries. "Državni tim priprema mjere uz projekciju da će otvaranje granica, prvo regionalnih, biti moguće početkom juna - od 1. do 10. juna" vijesti.meThey will impose mandatory Corona test on arrival. This can cost up to 100 Euros."Kada se granice otvore jedna od obaveza će biti i testiranje na koronavirus [...] Cijene ovih testova mogle bi iznositi od 25 do 100 eura, što bi za porodicu predstavljao veliki trošak."Edited: 4:55 pm, May 19, 2020

Entering Bosnia or Montenegro means leaving EU. Now when reading Slovenian conditions for EU-citizens arriving from outside of EU borders. Best of luck commuting between non-EU and EU. " S Hrvaškega lahko slovensko-hrvaško mejo prestopajo tuji državljani, ki imajo stalno ali začasno prebivališče in so lahko iz tretjih držav, če niso bili zunaj EU-ja več kot 14 dni. "There's no clearance what will happen to those who have stayed longer than 14 days outside of EU. Mandatory isolation or simply no entrance?
